expo.name: ShopIt - E-Shopping Platform
expo.description: ShopIt is a comprehensive e-shopping platform that connects buyers and sellers. Browse products, create shops, manage orders, and enjoy a seamless shopping experience with verified sellers and secure payments.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to let you select product images and profile photos.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to let you take photos for products and verification.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to help you find nearby shops and calculate shipping distances.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized shopping recommendations and better user experience.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select product images and profile photos.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for products and verification.
Allow ShopIt to access your camera for taking product photos and verification selfies.
